attributes.action: Change the legislation so that no person who is on the sex offenders register or who has been convicted of any sexual offence be allowed to stand for any public office e.g Councillor, MP or member of a Police Authority.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that any convictions of sexual offences should automatically expel anyone from any public office as one of the main roles of a councillor/ member of parliament is as a corporate parent these kind of convictions makes a mockery of the system and any crime involving children should be punished but if an offence does not receive a prison sentence of over 3 months at the present time anyone can hold these positions and carry on as though they have done nothing wrong this is a disgrace. if we are to protect our children as government policy states this law has to be changed.
